{
  "email": "admin@kappudoctor.com",
  "password": "adminPassword123",
  "fcmToken": "fcm_token_here",
  "deviceType": "android",
  "appVersion": "1.0.0"
}

{
  "phoneNumber": "+911234567890",
  "otp": "123456",
  "fcmToken": "fcm_token_here",
  "deviceType": "android",
  "appVersion": "1.0.0"
}

{
  "referredDoctor": "{{doctor_id}}",
  "patientName": "John Smith",
  "patientPhone": "+911234567890",
  "reason": "Cardiac consultation required",
  "notes": "Patient has chest pain and shortness of breath",
  "medicalHistory": "Hypertension for 5 years, diabetes for 2 years",
  "attachments": ["url1", "url2"]
}

request.description: Returns doctor-specific statistics including total referrals sent/received, pending referrals, and unread messages
Returns doctor-specific statistics including total referrals sent/received, pending referrals, unread messages, and arrays of referring and referred doctors
Returns comprehensive doctor profile data including registration data, profile completion data, referral info, communication preferences, device info, and completion status

{
  "doctorResponse": "Based on your symptoms, I recommend you visit the emergency room immediately. The chest pain combined with shortness of breath could indicate a serious condition that requires immediate medical attention.",
  "status": "accepted",
  "appointmentTime": "2024-01-20T14:00:00.000Z",
  "consultationType": "in-person",
  "additionalNotes": "Please bring your recent ECG reports and any previous cardiac test results if available. Also, avoid any strenuous activity until the appointment."
}
